text: Samuel Meredith (1741–1817) was an American merchant and politician who served as Treasurer of the United States from 1789 to 1801. Samuel Meredith may also refer to: *Samuel Meredith (police officer) (1794–1873), British policeman who was the first person to be appointed to the rank of Chief Constable *Samuel Meredith (Western Samoan politician) (1877–1936), Western Samoan politician and businessman who served in the Legislative Council from 1929 to 1932
title: Samuel Meredith (disambiguation)
